# paymentStatus

**Instance Property**

The current status of the payment.

## Declaration

```swift
var paymentStatus: INPaymentStatus { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify the current status of a scheduled payment. If the payment date of the bill is in the future, you typically set the payment status to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentStatus/pending]. For bills in the past, set the status to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentStatus/completed] if payment was successful or to another value if the transaction wasn’t completed. If you haven’t scheduled the bill for payment, set its status to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentStatus/unknown].

## Accessing the Bill Information

- **billPayee**: The entity receiving the payment.
- **paymentDate**: The scheduled payment date for the bill.
- **billType**: The type of the bill.
